messages.password_recovery: Instructions to reset your password will be sent to you shortly. Please check your email.

messages.update_success: Your information has been updated successfully! Please refresh the page to see the changes.

messages.phonenumber_validation: Please enter a valid phone number
messages.username_validation: Username must be 4-20 characters long, start and end with a letter or number, and contain only letters, numbers, dots, or underscores with no consecutive dots or underscores.
messages.invalid_tournament_error: This tournament seems to be invalid. Contact {{organizerEmail}} for more information about this tournament.
messages.session_expired_message: Session Expired: Your login session has expired for security reasons. Please log in again.
messages.tournament_info_not_found: No data was found for this tournament. Close this to go back to the previous view.
